main event: A pilot observed an unidentified rectangular object approximately 1 mile wide near King City, California on January 14, 1951.
interesting points: The object was described as having a flat top and appeared to become smaller as the aircraft approached,The colors and speed of the object were not reported,It was noted that there was insufficient data to draw conclusions regarding the object's nature,The report includes claims that the object could possibly have been a balloon, aircraft, or astronomical phenomenon,This sighting is part of the Project Blue Book documentation concerning UFO sightings.
